Description:
Formulate a well-defined project plan to streamline all the resources and activities for achieving high productivity.
Conduct on site investigations and analyze data (maps, reports, tests, drawings and other).
Identify possible challenges and create a well-drafted cost analysis report for the project.
Scheduling material and equipment purchases and deliveries.
Ensure appropriate implementation of measures taken during each step of project execution.
Assist the team in various project-related activities like planning, tendering, and pricing as per requirement.Skills
Skills:
Established track record of working in the Civil and Construction sector as an engineer.
Well-versed in solving practical project issues using computer software and relevant technological tools.
The ability to be flexible and adapt to different working conditions.
Remarkable command in developing accurate reports consisting of detailed information on materials, calculations, cost estimates, and other parameters.
Adept in managing human resources, thereby meeting deadlines with utmost efficiency.
Bachelor's degree in the field of Civil Engineering.
